meanings.definition: The way in which something is designed or arranged.
meanings.sent1: Her room's stylings were colorful and cheerful.
meanings.sent2: I love the stylings of this new furniture collection.
meanings.sent3: The mismatched stylings of his outfit made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The stylings of the garden were like a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The stylings of the party decorations were absolutely stunning.

meanings.definition: The particular way in which something is done or created.
meanings.sent1: His culinary stylings always impress his guests.
meanings.sent2: The artist's unique stylings set her apart from others.
meanings.sent3: The chef's experimental stylings sometimes lead to delicious surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her dance stylings were a graceful blend of tradition and modernity.
meanings.sent5: The writer's stylings captured the essence of the time period perfectly.

meanings.definition: The distinctive features or elements that characterize a particular style.
meanings.sent1: The singer's vocal stylings were instantly recognizable.
meanings.sent2: The film director's visual stylings created a unique atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's comedic stylings always left the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion stylings were a mix of vintage and contemporary trends.
meanings.sent5: The architect's architectural stylings were both innovative and functional.
